text: Tomara ki dekha na allaha nabhomandala o bhu-mandale yakichu ache, saba'i tomadera kaje niyojita kare diyechena ebam tomadera prati tamra prakasya o aprakasya neyamatasamuha paripurna kare diyechena? Emana loka o ache; yara jnana, pathanirdesa o ujjala kitaba chara'i allaha samparke bakabitanda kare.
